story_arceus_08_04000/2401_1001_0200_10:
So the Pokémon you think best represents
you as a Gym Leader is Onix.
story_arceus_08_04000/2401_1001_0400_10:
From the moment I decided to take on the
Arceus Cup, I knew my partner Pokémon
HAD to be Onix.
story_arceus_08_04000/2401_1001_0500_10:
I want Arceus to recognize our rock-hard
willpower and bond!
story_arceus_08_04000/2401_1001_0600_10:
That’s why I asked you to help me train,
Bruno. You’re one of Kanto’s strongest—
and a fellow Onix Trainer!
story_arceus_08_04000/2401_1001_0800_10:
Onix is a Pokémon that can take a lot
of hits in battle.
story_arceus_08_04000/2401_1001_0900_10:
I often send it out first to gauge my
opponents’ strength.
story_arceus_08_04000/2401_1001_1000_10:
I can tell how much you’ve battled beside
Onix as a Gym Leader, Brock.
story_arceus_08_04000/2401_1001_1100_10:
It’s clear you two have withstood your
challengers’ hardest hits over and over.
story_arceus_08_04000/2401_1001_1200_10:
I can tell, even without looking at your
Onix’s battle-hardened physique.
story_arceus_08_04000/2401_1001_1300_10:
Your rock-hard willpower and bond—I hope
Arceus notices it.
story_arceus_08_04000/2401_1001_1500_10:
We’ll be sure to turn all this experience and
training into strength!
story_arceus_08_04000/2401_1001_1600_10: I see. Then let’s move on.
story_arceus_08_04000/2401_1001_1700_10:
My Fighting-type Pokémon will grind you
down with their superior power!
story_arceus_08_04000/2401_1001_2000_10:
The best offense is a good defense! That’s
our way of doing things!
